isLoopVariable.circuit: module main() wire test(16) for $i = 0 to 2 step 1 do test += $i

isFullSignal.circuit: module main() wire test(16), other(16) test += other

isBitOfSignal.circuit: module main() wire test(16), other(16) test += other.0

isBitRangeOfSignal.circuit: module main() wire test(16), other(16) test += other.0:8

isBitOfSignalDimension.circuit: module main() wire test(16), other[2](16) test += other[1].5

isBitRangeOfSignalDimension.circuit: module main() wire test(16), other[2](16) test += other[1].5:14

isBitOfNestedSignalDimension.circuit: module main() wire test(16), other[2][1][5](16) test += other[1][0][3].5

isBitRangeOfNestedSignalDimension.circuit: module main() wire test(16), other[2][1][5](16) test += other[1][0][3].5:14
